hackathon-description-text: You will have 24 hours to design and develop a product from scratch! We will provide all the food and drinks needed to keep you going! and our sponsors will give you cool hardware and APIs to play with!
hackathon-eligibility:
- Teams of size 1-4 can win prizes!
- Again, no code before the event!
- Participants must be over 18 and be enrolled in university!
hackathon-requirements: - Challenges will be announced by sponsors on the day! Submit images of your application, some backround info about it and the code! Also a tweetable short description
hackathon-rules:
No code should be complete before the event!
MLH are sanctioning the event and so everyone will have to follow there code of conduct! http://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Dundee, Dundee, Dundee City DD1 4HN, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How awesome your hack is. There will be different judging for the various challenges

hackathon-location-address: Dundee, Dundee, Dundee City DD1 4HN, UK
